documentation.title: Textfield
documentation.description: This is a customizable text field supporting style configurations, labels, and actions. The component offers flexibility in adjusting sizes, styles, managing input data, and displaying information.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: The basic configuration demonstrates the simplest use of the text field component. It only binds a value and offers minimal settings for handling user input without additional customization or advanced functionality.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: The advanced configuration demonstrates a more versatile use of the text field component. This setup includes additional properties such as a custom ID, name, label, placeholder, and helper text, providing greater control over the appearance and functionality of the component.

invalid.title: Invalid
invalid.description: The invalid configuration demonstrates the text field component in an error state. It may include a helper message informing users of input requirements, and the field is visually marked as invalid to help the user correct their input.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: The 'Disabled' configuration illustrates the text field component in a non-editable state. It does not allow the user to interact with the field but displays its current value or placeholder, making it useful for read-only views or temporarily disabling input.
